archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Extra-curricular - Socialising/Startups/Sports etc
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Provide social spaces for students - internal and external? Shops?
Union and societies
Sept 2011: The Students' Union (UBU) Information Point on Tyndall Avenue is now open Monday to Friday (10am to 4pm) giving students access to information and advice at the centre of the Precinct. The Information Point also provides a gateway to UBU sports clubs and societies, volunteering activities and events and sells theatre and gig tickets as well as University of Bristol merchandise.
